extendedInfo.description: Fuel conso : Check the fuel consumption of your vehicles !Tired of suffering rising fuel prices without control your fuel consumption? Fuel conso permit you to save money by following the fuel cost of your vehicles and the price evolution of the fuel. You only have to set the price when you fill it up and the number of kilometer you have done. Don't forget to reset the milometer !=== Features ===- Multiple vehicle support- Possibility to input fill up whenever you want- Manage Partial fill up- Two kind of input : global kilometers or partial.- Dynamically zoomable statistics chart view- Publish your charts on Facebook- Send your charts by mail/sms- Install to SD Card (OS 2.2+)- Available in english and french- Coming much more soonPlease send by mail (not in comments) the feature you would like in the application !=== Notice ===Main screen :It contains the vehicles list. Since you set up the application a sample car is available.  The button "+" in the bottom of the screen pemits you to add a vehicle.In front of each vehicle name two icons are available. The first one permits you to add a consumption (when you fill it up your car for example). The second one permits you to print the statistics of a vehicle.Statistics screen :The first tab print the consumption list of the vehicle.The second one shows a graph of the evolution of the fuel price.Note : You can modify or delete the vehicle by using the menu.The last one shows a graph of the evolution of the vehicle consumption per 100km.You can move the application to the SD card.kw : fuel pump consumption car bike trunk diesel oil unloaded LPG statistic stats control Logger Mileage Log FuelLog graphic graphs
